document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Phylund Villa on Copper Street.
document_data.name: Phylund Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Phylund Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Phylund]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the west section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the southeast of the intersection where [[Julthoon Street]] met [[Copper Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled compound contained three buildings arranged around a central courtyard. The buildings were between two and three storys tall.
